turns.text: Cause you go to meetings and you are required to look your best and look professional of course

turns.label: b

turns.text: Yeah I think in todays society uh there is more credibility to be quite honest --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- I will always remember - I will tell this real quick story when I graduated from college my first job years ago uh thirty years ago twenty-nine years ago in fact was selling agricultural fertilizer
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I worked for the uh Smith Douglas Division of Borden Chemical and I sold uh you know manure
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh I would go out and call on farmers and I would always try to look my best wearing sport coats and things like that but I was calling on guys that wore bib overalls
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And so one day I got up and thought well I will just go casual and you know that I called on guy wearing exactly that bib overalls and he sort of told me that he expected me to be professional --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and he sort of expected me to dress as professional --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- so uh it was sort of -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- even back then so I sort uh been aware of my dress ever since then and --
-- try to look my best but here again I dress casual quite bit so -

It gives you confidence In my business if I call on the the Penney company here in Dallas or say someone say Sears and Roebuck in Chicago then I wear coat and tie If I call on just uh normal little dealer of mine I might be casual
turns.label: sd

Although he shouldnt be evaluated on that
